description:
Let the battle begin! With so many competitors on one stage, teamwork is in short supply. Going off alone could mean the elimination of some powerful warriors!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Kampf ums Überleben beginnt! – Vorhang auf für das Turnier der Kraft!
Ikinokore! Tsui ni Kaimaku "Chikara no Taikai"!!
Survive! The Tournament of Power Begins at Last!!
生き残れ! ついに開幕「力の大会」!!
